post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Our client within the Document Manufacturing Industry is seeking a JAVA Developer for a 3-month contract with the possibility of extension. This opportunity is located within the GTA West. Below is listed the details for your review. If you are interested in this opportunity please send an updated word version of your resume and your contact information at your earliest convenience. If you are not interested in the role; please send the contact information of any colleagues that may be interested in this position. Thank you in advance for your time.
Job Responsibilities: Engage with existing development team to assist in the execution of JAVA-based application for their customer Work with back-end developers to co-ordinate timely execution of project timelines Communicate with developers and internal stakeholders to ensure development requirements for the project are being met
Qualifications: Minimum 7-years JAVA/C++ development experience Strong communication skills Financial industry experience (preference given to tax-related projects) Strong leadership abilities
Nice to Have: Experience working with XML Experience in both UNIX and Windows environments
____________________________________________ Nicole Padfield PROFESSIONAL RECRUITER 350 Burnhamthorpe Road West, Suite 700, Mississauga, Ontario, L5B 3J1 800.254.0778 905.283.1327 WWW.TEKSYSTEMS.CA
post.title: JAVA Developer ( Contract )
